question: Which {SNP} has {gene@gene@} as its {eQTL}?
general - relationship - specific.cyper_for_intermediate_page: MATCH (snp_node:variants:sequence_variant)-[eQTL_of:fine_mapped_eQTL]-(gene_node:coding_elements {id:'@gene@'}) MATCH (snp_node)-[belong_to_credible_set:belong_to_credible_set]->(credible_set_node:credible_set) RETURN snp_node, eQTL_of, gene_node, belong_to_credible_set, credible_set_node
general - relationship - specific.selection_result: snp_node, eQTL_of, gene_node, belong_to_credible_set, credible_set_node, data_source, tissue
general - relationship - specific.question_for_result: How does SNP @snp_node@ contribute to the regulation of @gene_node@ eQTL in @tissue@ tissue, according to @data_source@
general - relationship - specific.cyper_for_result_page_all_nodes_specific: MATCH (snp_node:variants:sequence_variant {id: '@sequence_variant@'})-[r:fine_mapped_eQTL]-(gene_node:coding_elements {id: '@gene@'}) OPTIONAL MATCH (snp_node)-[r1]-(extend_node_snp) OPTIONAL MATCH (gene_node)-[r2]-(extend_node_gene) RETURN snp_node, r, gene_node, r1, extend_node_snp, r2, extend_node_gene LIMIT 15
next_questions: Which {function ontologies@ontology} are linked to {gene identifier@n1:gene}?
